panels.description: Note that this table shows the average values for the entire period selected in the dashboard. Consequently, it may contain information about Pods or namespaces that were changed or deleted during the selected period.

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) )

sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Off"}[$__range]))) * 0
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Initial"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 1
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Auto"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 2
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Recreate"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 3
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) * 0 + 5

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])  * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (pod)
(
  avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod)
  (
    sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
    -
    sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
  ) > 0
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) 
  (
    (
      (
        sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
        -
        sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
      ) or sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
    ) > 0
  )
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
    /
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
    * on (pod)
    sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
  )
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (pod)
(
  avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
        -
        sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
      ) > 0
    )
  )
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
        -
        sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
      ) or sum by (namespace, pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
    ) > 0
  )
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  # Select data rates if Pod had 'hostNetwork: false' during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  # Sum data rates for all interfaces of the Pod.
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
) or (
  # Return -1 if the Pod had 'hostNetwork: false' during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * -1
)

(
  # Select data rates if Pod had 'hostNetwork: false' during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  # Sum data rates for all interfaces of the Pod.
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
) or (
  # Return -1 if the Pod had 'hostNetwork: false' during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])
  * -1
)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__range]) * 0)

panels.title: Pods

1.text: Some containers not running or ready

targets.expr:
min by (pod) (
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"}
  * on (pod) group_right()
  (
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (label_replace(min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]), "phase", "Ready", "", "")) == 1) * 0 + 0
    )
    or on(pod)
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (min_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) == 1) * 0
      + on(phase) group_left()
      (
        label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Unknown", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Failed", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Succeeded", "", "")
      )
    )
  )  
)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt
panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources higher than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.
panels.title: Over-requested by pod

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources lower than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.
panels.title: Under-requested by pod

panels.description: The absence of data on the graph means that container resources are not set

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (pod) (
    kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}
    * on (pod)
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))) 
    / 
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) 
* 
sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: Throttling

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $pod

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $pod

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.
panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.
panels.title: Over-requested by pod

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.
panels.title: Under-requested by pod

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_swap{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $pod

panels.description: This graph shows Network Receive (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

-1.text: Network graph for Pod with hostNetwork: true is meaningless

panels.title: Receive

panels.description: This graph shows Network Transmit (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

-1.text: Network graph for Pod with hostNetwork: true is meaningless

panels.title: Transmit

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks
panels.title: PVC Provisioned (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum by (pod, persistentvolumeclaim)
(
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}
  * on (pod)  group_right(persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    (avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    * 
    on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
    (
      max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) 
        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
        max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
          label_replace(
            max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
            "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
          + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
      * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
      avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Usage (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
sum by (pod, persistentvolumeclaim)
(
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller", pod=~"$pod"}
  * on (pod)  group_right(persistentvolumeclaim) (
  (
    avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) * 
    on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
    (
      max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) 
        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
        max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
          label_replace(
            max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
            "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
          + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
      * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
      avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
  )
)
/
(
sum by (pod, persistentvolumeclaim)
(
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"}
  * on (pod)  group_right(persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    * 
    on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
    (
      avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      *     on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
    (
      max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) 
        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
        max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
          label_replace(
            max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
            "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
          + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
      * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
      avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
  )
)))

panels.title: PVC Usage in % (except local storage classes)

panels.title: $persistentvolumeclaim
